resources.string:
<html>
			<head>
				<style>
					body
					{
						font-size: {fontSize}px;
						color: {fontcolor};
						text-align: left;
					}
					
					p.word
					{
						font-weight: bold;
						font-style: italic;
					}
					
					.highlight, b, a{color: #079dd0;}
				</style>
			</head>
			<body>
				{content}    
		    </body>
	    </html>
